channel.title: kubeadm on Crismar.Me
channel.description: Recent content in kubeadm on Crismar.Me

item.title: September & October '17: kubeadm, K8s API, VIM, and a little Housekeeping
item.description: I’m trying a new approach for my documenting process. Namely: Shorter posts on the blog. More tweets to share more of the day-to-day. Walkthrough guides will now be versioned(as they should) on GitHub. Without further ado here’s what I’ve been up to: Bare Metal & kubeadm I picked up kubeadm and build a bare metal Kubernetes cluster. I wrote a guide about it, you can find it on GitHub.
